articles.title: The most popular air travel day this year was a mess. That won't change anytime soon
articles.description: Americans gained a new federal holiday last year: Juneteenth. This year the holiday, which commemorates of the end of slavery in the United States, falls on Sunday but it will be observed in many places on Monday, June 20.

articles.title: Here's what it would mean to these Americans if Biden canceled student loan debt
articles.description: About 43 million people are waiting to find out if President Joe Biden will wipe away all or part of their federal student loan debt. CNN spoke with eight former college students about what it would mean for them if Biden canceled some student loan debt.
